thread.title: Apple has a brand new 9.7-inch iPad that’s cheaper than ever
thread.title_full: Apple has a brand new 9.7-inch iPad that’s cheaper than ever

author: Chris Smith
title: Apple has a brand new 9.7-inch iPad that’s cheaper than ever
text:
The iPad isn’t as hot as it used to be, but Apple is far from being ready to throw in the towel. Tim Cook is still a very big fan of the iPad and tablets are still huge money makers for Apple. After weeks of speculation, Apple on Tuesday unveiled a slew of new products, including just one new iPad model, not four as previous rumors alleged. In fact, the brand new iPad comes in a form factor that many have grown to love. It's the same 9.7-inch device but it's priced lower than it's ever been.
Continue reading...

Nintendo finally issued a formal response to the biggest problem people have with the Switch Apple Store goes down ahead of possible first new product launch of 2017 New leaks show how impressive Samsung’s Galaxy S8 design truly is
